doctor.name: Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous
doctor.info: Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous is a General Surgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS, MS (Surgery). He is a Senior Consultant, Dept of Surgery at 300 Bed Hospital, Narayanganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. A.K.M Shafiul Alam Ferdous at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 11am to 2pm (Sat, Mon & Wed) & 5pm to 8pm (Sun & Thu).

doctor.name: Dr. Gazi Muhammad Salahuddin
doctor.degree: MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), MCPS (Surgery), FMAS (India), FACS (USA)
doctor.info: Dr. Gazi Muhammad Salahuddin is a Colorectal Surgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS (DMC), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), MCPS (Surgery), FMAS (India), FACS (USA). He is a Consultant, Dept of Surgery at General Hospital, Narayanganj. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Gazi Muhammad Salahuddin at Medinova Medical Services, Narayanganj is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Tue & Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Mejbahul Bahar
doctor.specialty: General, Laparoscopic, Breast & Laser Piles Surgeon
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Mejbahul Bahar is a General Surgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), MRCS (UK). He is a Assistant Professor, Dept of Surgery at Faridpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Mejbahul Bahar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 8pm to 9:30pm (Mon, Tue & Thu).
